settings.title: New Station
settings.callsign_help: Amateur radio callsign of the station with optional SSID. Example: N0CALL-1
settings.passcode_help: APRS-IS passcode of the station. Example: -1 for a receive only station.
settings.filter_help: APRS-IS filter as described in the APRS-IS specification https://www.aprs-is.net/javAPRSFilter.aspx. Example: m/50 to receive reports in 50km range.
settings.server_help: APRS-IS Tier-2 region to connect to. Citizen Weather Observer Program is automatically selected for CWOP-stations.

error.filter_invalid: Filter as described in the APRS-IS specification https://www.aprs-is.net/javAPRSFilter.aspx
